citeinfo.origin: Nicole Hayhow, GIS Map Department, Indiana Department of Transportion, Graphics Engineering
citeinfo.title: INCORPORATED_AREAS_INDOT_IN: Incorporated Boundaries in Indiana (Indiana Department of Transportation, Polygon Shapefile)

pubinfo.publish: Indiana Department of Transportation, Graphics Engineering

citeinfo.othercit: This data set was provided to personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) by Indiana Department of Transportation, Graphics Engineering personnel. The data set provided was in an ESRI shapefile format, and was named "CORPLINE_INDOT_2003." An updated version of this data set was provided to personnel of the IGS by INDOT personnel on September 13, 2006. The data set provided was in an ESRI shapefile format, and was named "GISINFO.CORPLINE.SHP."

descript.abstract:
INCORPORATED_AREAS_INDOT_IN is a polygon shapefile that contains incorporated area boundaries (Cities and Towns) in Indiana, provided by personnel of Indiana Department of Transportation (INDOT), Graphics Engineering. The data set provided by INDOT was in an ESRI shapefile format and was named "CORPLINE_INDOT_2003." INCORPORATED_AREAS_INDOT_IN is attributed with incorporated names (and) area and perimeter numbers. An updated version of this data set was provided to personnel of the IGS by INDOT personnel on September 13, 2006. The updated data set provided was in an ESRI shapefile format, and was named "GISINFO.CORPLINE.SHP."
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by INDOT, Graphics and Engineering for the source shapefile GISINFO.CORPLINE.SHP:
"The polygon shapefile represents the incorporated area boundaries ( Cities and Towns) in the State of Indiana. Approximately 568 incorporated boundaries are represented within this data set."
descript.purpose: This data set was developed to delineate incorporated area boundaries for all the cities and towns in State of Indiana.
descript.supplinf:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by INDOT, Graphics and Engineering for the source shapefile GISINFO.CORPLINE.SHP:
"Polygon layer representing approximately 568 incorporated boundaries are within (+) or (-) 8 to 10 meters (26ft to 32 ft) of accuracy. Source Maps of Road Inventory was utilized using the "latest dated" Active Maps as a basis for changing the corporation boundaries of the Cities and Towns of each of the 92 counties of the State of Indiana. Visual alignment of the corporation boundaries was applied to the DOQQ's."

timeperd.current: Based on metadata provided by INDOT, Graphics and Engineering for the source shapefile GISINFO.CORPLINE.SHP.

citeinfo.origin: INDOT, Graphics and Engineering; Nicole Hayhow
citeinfo.title: GISINFO.CORPLINE.SHP (Incorporated Boundaries)

srctime.srccurr: Based on metadata provided by INDOT, Graphics and Engineering for the source shapefile GISINFO.CORPLINE.SHP.

procstep.procdesc: IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named CORPLINE_INDOT_2003 from INDOT personnel in April, 2004. CORPLINE_INDOT_2003 was loaded into ESRI ArcView 3.3 and the following columns were deleted from the associated attribute table: OBJECTID, CORPFIX_C_, CORPFIX_C1, SHAPE_LENG, SHAPE_AREA, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, EDIT_BY, AND NOTES. IGS personnel then saved the edited shapefile as INCORPORATED_AREAS_INDOT_IN. It should also be noted that portions of the associated metadata provided by INDOT for CORPLINE_INDOT_2003 were extracted and included in this metadata file.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named GISINFO.CORPLINE from INDOT personnel on September 13, 2006. GISINFO.CORPLINE was loaded into ESRI ArcMap and the following columns were deleted from the associated attribute table: OBJECTID, AREA, PERIMETER, CORPFIX_C_, CORPFIX_C1, SHAPE_LE, SHAPE_AR_1, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, EDIT_BY, INC_NUMBER, and NOTES. Two new fields titled "AREA" and "PERIMETER" were added and values were calculated using ESRI ArcMap scripts. IGS personnel then saved the edited shapefile as INCORPORATED_AREAS_INDOT_IN. It should also be noted that portions of the associated metadata provided by INDOT for GISINFO.CORPLINE were extracted and included in this metadata file.

This metadata file was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v. 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v. 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (U.S. Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

distinfo.distliab:
CREDIT
It is requested that the Graphics and Engineering Section, Indiana Department of Transportation be cited in any products generated from this data. The following source citation should be included: [INCORPORATED_AREAS_INDOT_IN: Incorporated Boundaries in Indiana (Indiana Department of Transportation, Polygon Shapefile)].
WARRANTY
Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey warrants that the media on which this product is stored will be free from defect in materials and workmanship for ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition. If such a defect is found, return the media to Publication Sales, Indiana Geological Survey, 611 North Walnut Grove, Bloomington, Indiana 47405-2208, and it will be replaced free of charge.
LIMITATION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
Except for the expressed warranty above, the product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey shares no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey is not responsible for claims by a third party. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

By acceptance of this data, the user agrees not to transmit this data or provide access to it, or any part of it, to another party unless the user shall include with the data a copy of this disclaimer. INDOT makes no guarantee or warranty concerning the accuracy of information contained in the geographic data. INDOT further makes no warranties, either expressed or implied as to any other matter whatsoever, including, without limitation, the condition of any product, or its fitness for any particular purpose. The burden for determining fitness for use lies entirely with the user. Although these data have been processed successfully on computers of INDOT, no warranty, expressed or implied, is made by INDOT regarding the use of these data on any other system, nor does the fact of distribution constitute or imply any such warranty.
In no event shall INDOT have any liability whatsoever for payment of any consequential, incidental, indirect, special, or tort damages of any kind, including, but not limited to, any loss of profits arising out of or reliance on the geographic data or arising out of the delivery, installation, operation, or support by INDOT."

metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
